thread.title: BRIEF-Ascendant Resources Reports Qtrly ‍​ Loss Per Share Of $0.02

title: BRIEF-Ascendant Resources Reports Qtrly ‍​ Loss Per Share Of $0.02
text: March 21, 2018 / 11:08 PM / Updated 44 minutes ago BRIEF-Ascendant Resources Reports Qtrly ‍​ Loss Per Share Of $0.02 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 21 (Reuters) - Ascendant Resources Inc: * ASCENDANT RESOURCES REPORTS FREE CASH FLOW IN Q4 AND RECORD DECEMBER PRODUCTION AT THE REHABILITATED EL MOCHITO MINE * ‍QTRLY NET CONCENTRATE SALES REVENUE OF $23.93 MILLION, UP 37% FROM Q3 2017​ * QTRLY ‍​ LOSS PER SHARE $0.02 * ‍QUARTERLY MILLED TONNES INCREASED 13% TO 198,354 TONNES, UP FROM 176,037 TONNES IN Q3 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
